ygData.subject: RE: [shadowknight] Question
ygData.msgSnippet: Hehe.   D.O.T. = Damage over Time.  These refer to your Darkness line of spells.....Clinging Darkness, Engulfing Darkness (etc) and your poison/disease spells.
ygData.messageBody:
RE: [shadowknight] Question

Hehe.   D.O.T. = Damage over Time.  These refer to your Darkness line of spells.....Clinging Darkness, Engulfing Darkness (etc) and your poison/disease spells.

Use 'em and abuse 'em.  They'll make you a better SK.

-----Original Message-----
From: James Jones [mailto:jjones@...]
Sent: Thursday, June 29, 2000 4:09 AM
To: shadowknight@egroups.com
Subject: [shadowknight] Question


This is probably a stupid question but what does D.O.T mean!!!?

I keep hearing it but I still haven't figured out what it's supposed to
mean????



James
